title: The Shining
description: It's a deeply suspenseful paranormal story about Jack Torrance, who starts a new job as a caretaker at the Overlook Hotel, hoping to spend more time with his family and work on his writing. During the off-season, a chilling winter storm confines Jack to the hotel — and sinister forces begin to emerge.

title: It
description: In Derry, Maine, seven teenagers first discovered the horror that they deemed 'It' — often taking the form of Pennywise the Clown. Now adults, each with their own successes, one of the self-proclaimed 'Losers Club' asks the gang to return and end the evil creature's reign once and for all.

title: Misery
description: Paul gets in an accident and is rescued by Anne Wilkes, his #1 fan. While nursing Paul back to health after he shattered legs, she compels to write a novel, furious that he killed her favorite character.

title: Carrie
description: Carrie White, a telekinetic teenager who's able to move objects with her mind. Abused and bullied all her life, one traumatic day unleashes a streak of revenge that cumulates with a famously terrifying prom night scene.

title: The Gunslinger
description: This is the first installment of King's hugely popular series 'The Dark Tower', of which there are eight books and a short story. Roland of Gilead is The Last Gunslinger — the final hero in a knightly order.
This is a time travel adventure novel that tells the story of Jake Epping, a high school English teacher who is introduced to a portal to 1958 and sets out on a mission to stop the JFK assassination.
